Paragraph: PTATDPP and PTAFDPP show the absorption maxima ( λ max ) at 654 nm and 666 nm in solution , respectively , as shown in Fig.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| λ max |
| 654 nm |
| 666 nm |

Explanation:

* "λ max" is a property name that refers to the wavelength of maximum absorption of light by a substance.
* "654 nm" and "666 nm" are specific values of the "λ max" property for the substances PTATDPP and PTAFDPP, respectively.
